  • Constructor Details

    • MinestomThread

      public MinestomThread​(int nThreads, java.lang.String name)
      Creates a non-local thread pool executor
      Parameters:
      nThreads - the number of threads
      name - the name of the thread pool

    • MinestomThread

      public MinestomThread​(int nThreads, java.lang.String name, boolean local)
      Parameters:
      nThreads - the number of threads
      name - the name of the thread pool
      local - set to true if this executor is only used inside a method and should *not* be kept in the internal list of executors
